mapper.select: SELECT t_combo_item.* ,t_portfolio_project.name, t_portfolio_project.short_name, t_portfolio_project.order_num, t_portfolio_project.sale_price, t_portfolio_project.suitable_range, t_portfolio_project.introduce, t_portfolio_project.address, t_portfolio_project.remark, t_portfolio_project.is_file, t_portfolio_project.url, t_portfolio_project.department_id, t_portfolio_project.template, t_portfolio_project.service_type, t_portfolio_project.specimen, t_portfolio_project.diagnostic, t_portfolio_project.office_id, t_portfolio_project.office_name FROM t_combo_item LEFT JOIN t_portfolio_project ON t_portfolio_project.id = t_combo_item.portfolio_project_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
